products.name: Ultra-Semi Diamond Knife 35°
products.desc: The Ultra-semi is used for alternating ultra-thin/semi-thin sectioning. It is similar to the Diatome Ultra 35° 3.0 mm diamond knife with a greater thickness range (50-500nm).

products.name: Ultra ATS Diamond Knife
products.desc: The Ultra ATS Diamond knife is perfect for placing sections on Si wafers to view under the SEM. The knife comes in 3.0mm size with 35 deg angle. See the Technical Data Sheet for illustration showing technique of placing sections on a wafer.

subproducts.name: Description: Ultra ATS Diamond Knife

products.name: Cryo 35° Cryo 45°
products.desc: Used for all low temperature sectioning of cryo-specimens, frozen hydrated specimens,and polymers and rubber. Section thickness ranges from 30nm-1um. Cutting edge sizes are 1.5-4mm.

products.name: Cryo Immuno Diamond Knife
products.desc: Best possible sectioning for cryo-immuno-chemistry. The diamond platform guarantees easy and gentle section collection. The 35 degree cutting angle leads to a considerable reduction in mechanical stresses.

products.name: Diamond Trimming Tool
products.desc: For quick, easy and accurate trimming, The Diatome trimming blades are superior for both room and cryo-temperatures. Due to the extreme sharpness of our diamond blades, less mechanical damage is applied to the sample during trimming.

products.name: UltraTrim 45°
products.desc: Your resharpened DiATOME knife will have the same length, the identical cutting edge and carry the same exact guarantee of quality as the day it first left our factory. During resharpening a knife may be reworked into another type.

subproducts.name: Description: UltraTrim 45°

products.name: The EM Trim Diamond Cutter for the Leica "EM-Trim "
products.desc: These cutters are used exclusively in the Leica EM Trim. These blades allow for parallel edges of the complete block which is mandatory for successful sectioning.

products.name: Cryo-AFM Diamond Knife
products.desc: High quality Diatome diamond knives are perfect for surfacing sectioning of biological and industrial specimens for AFM investigation. The diamond knives produce extremely smooth sample surfaces and with the best possible structure preservation.

products.desc: Diamond knives are for sectioning of hard and soft biological and industrial materials, non embedded or embedded in methacrylate or epoxy resins at room temperature. They have a 45 degree angle.

products.name: Jumbo Diamond Knives for Histology
products.desc: Easy production of section ribbons (0.5-2 micron) with no section loss or folding. With same orientation of all sections and easy ribbon collection. Perfect for Immuno-histochemistry.

products.name: FEI Volume Scope
products.desc: Diamond knives for the FEI Volume Scope are available from the experts at DiATOME. The New knives are delivered in a Volume Scope-compatible holder.

subproducts.name: Description: FEI Volume Scope - New
Description: FEI Volume Scope - Resharpen

products.name: DiATOME manip
products.desc: For easily handling and mounting of section ribbons on Leica cryochambers. Easily mounted. The original plate on the cryochamber is removed, the manipulator is fixed in 5 minutes.

subproducts.name: Description: DiATOME manip

products.name: The Static Line II Ionizer
products.desc: The Static Line II ionizer antistatic device emits negative and positive ions, neutralizing the electrostatic charging. Sections no longer stick to the knife edge, or bunch up, but float in a ribbon over the knife surface.

subproducts.name: Description: Static Line Ionizer
